issue.title: [Rust] [DataFusion] Support nested SELECT statements
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-10666](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-10666). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Support nested `SELECT` statements, for example:

```Java

SELECT a, b 
FROM (
  SELECT a, b, c 
  FROM (
    SELECT a, b, c, d 
    FROM t
  )
)
```

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-10666?focusedCommentId=17238507) by Jorge Leitão (jorgecarleitao):*
Issue resolved by pull request 8727
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/8727>
